    • setHumanUserShips

      public void setHumanUserShips(String userShip)
      Setter method to place human ships on the board Replaces '_' in board array with 's'
      Parameters:
      userShip - Accepts coordinates of User Ship in Uppercase

    • setHumanUserGrenades

      public void setHumanUserGrenades(String userGrenade)
      Setter method to place human grenades on the board Replaces '_' in board array with 'g'
      Parameters:
      userGrenade - Accepts coordinates of User Grenades in Uppercase

    • isCoordinateValid

      public boolean isCoordinateValid(String coord)
      Method to verify if the coordinates entered by user are valid or not
      Parameters:
      coord - Represents the coordinate entered by user
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates entered are valid / if the chosen cordinate is already been used

    • setComputerShipsAndGrenades

      public void setComputerShipsAndGrenades()
      Setter method to place ships and grenades for computer randomly at coordinates which are not used by human player Replaces '_' in the board array with 'S' to represent ships and 'G' to represent grenades

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      This method checks if win condition is met, that is, when the humanUserShips or the computerShips have all been sunk and the value becomes 0.
      Returns:
      false, whether every ship on either side has been sunk(game over); true, if game is still ongoing

    • gameTurn

      public boolean gameTurn()
      This method is used to alternate between user and computer using the counterTurn and a modulus, as the game progresses
      Returns:
      true, when it is the human user's turn; false, when it's computer's turn

    • humanUserMove

      public void humanUserMove(String value)
      This method is used to pass user target coordinates into modifyBoard as it is a private method.
      Parameters:
      value - coordinates entered by human player

    • computerMove

      public void computerMove()
      This method is uses random computer target coordinates using the random function and prints it with the appropriate notation Pass coordinates into updateBoard

    • getHumanUserTurnLoss

      public int getHumanUserTurnLoss()
      A getter method to return humanUserTurnLoss
      Returns:
      number of player turns lost to grenades

    • getComputerTurnLoss

      public int getComputerTurnLoss()
      A getter method to return computerTurnLoss
      Returns:
      number of computer turns lost to grenades

    • printModifiedBoard

      public void printModifiedBoard()
      This method is used to print 8x8 board in its current state It prints corresponding character to show when element is hit by user/computer using the letter codes from modifyBoard. This method also checks for any remaining ships/grenades when the game is over in order print the location of all elements on the board, and replaces any '*' with an '_'.
